c6d5bcb2fefb.title: The face of a child shows their joy when they get a word of encouragement or a helping hand.

paragraphs.text: The face of a child shows their joy when they get a word of encouragement or a helping hand. We know it brings joy to us as children but for some reason we forget when we are all grown up. Jesus’ words echo in my mind, “whatever you have done for the least of these you have done for me.” There are millions of people who are the “least of these” in…

6c46ddf8c9ac.title: I’ve been drawing cartoons a long time, so I suppose it’s kind of second nature to me.

paragraphs.text: I’ve been drawing cartoons a long time, so I suppose it’s kind of second nature to me. Thanks for your interest!
paragraphs.name: 861c

paragraphs.text: Most Bearded One- Thanks. My cartoons are non-digital. Just black ball point pen and watercolors. For archival work, I’ll use a Hunt 102 nib, India ink and sometimes a brush.
paragraphs.name: 1b23

2a6eb239ddd7.title: This story is such a perfect example of why I love Medium, discovering something new everyday.

paragraphs.text: This story is such a perfect example of why I love Medium, discovering something new everyday. Stories like this deserve to go viral, even as they validate those of us who don’t need converting. Empathy is a funny thing, is it learned or innate? Some of us have it, some of us don’t. I think mine’s innate. Years ago, I sat in a movie theatre and…

8fc6abb4917a.name: Most Bearded One
8fc6abb4917a.bio: There once was a man with a beard, To others he seemed rather queer. He loved a good tweet, And a book and a beat, And boredom was his greatest fear.
